name: POPixel
description: Hey, have you ever dreamed of being fired by a cannon as a bullet man? How about jumping on balloons popping them ?? You can do all this with POPixel. The game where you become one, jumping and popping balloons. Oh, and don't forget to collect the coins !!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: IDT High Definition Audio CODEC

reviews.review_text: POPixel is a frustrating pixel graphic game. It just isn't fun! There are flash games better than this, with better controls. And they are FREE!

POPixel is a really fun and relaxing game to chill out to, perfect for those looking for a casual arcade title with a steady difficulty curve. The pixel art is superb and has that familiar SNES and Genesis vibe, and there's a lot of levels to play through and items to collect to reach full 100% completion. Highly recommended.
